Text:
Bonnar was struggling with Griffin and Soszynski.
Soszynski!!! WTF!
The UFC straight aim is to go down the drain. Money, money, money, and the human kind the greed the lust, Dana White, you greedy coc***er.

Don't like it?  Go fuck yourself.

I'm excited for the fight, as are millions of others.  Yes, it's lopsided.  That's what makes it exciting this time.

I don't like it. And I am not going to fuck myself. 
I will rather visit your house and fuck your mother, sister, father and maybe even your dog. Anally. Then I will find YOU and throatfuck you until you threw up. Multiple times. After that I will play you some "lopsided" records. And you will like it. Diving in a barrel full of shit will be the final savior for your retarded low budget behavior.
u can watch the fight here for free, all you tards are welcome... http://www.thefirstrow.eu/watch/146549/1/watch-ufc-153:-silva-vs-bonnar.html, believe me or dont, could care less lmao.

@moonspire... if your gonna insult somebody, maybe you should try using words that make sense. perhaps even a spelling check wouldn't hurt. maybe a little creativity so that you can come up with something better than "i'm gonna fuck your dog and play you lopsided records". lol... WTF does that even mean?
